content.question: The Vietnam War differed from the Korean War in that the Vietnam War

choices.label: involved the United States in an indirect confrontation with the Soviet Union
involved United States troops without a formal congressional declaration of war
generated criticism of the governmentâ€™s military policies
ended with the collapse of the government that the United States had supported
grew out of the policy of containment

content.answer: ended with the collapse of the government that the United States had supported

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
